Description:
Detects Obfuscated use of Clip.exe to execute PowerShell

Author: Jonathan Cheong, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Invoke-Obfuscation CLIP+ Launcher - System
Query: sourcetype='windows-system' eql select * from _source_ where provider_name = 'service control manager' and eventid = '7045' and (imagepath like '%cmd%' and imagepath like '%&&%' and imagepath like '%clipboard]::%')
